title: Brand Is buugged
body: Riot, i have come across a bug with brands ult now where, it does not bounce from champion to champion at all

replies.body:
Hey there,

If this truly is a bug and just not a misunderstanding on your part, the best place to post this would be the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board over on NA, please include as much detail as possible with the report.

Don't forget to read the [How to Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) thread in that section to learn what information needs to be included and the best practices when reporting a bug.
